components.name: Backup as a Service || Veeam Backup Managed

incident_updates.body: Start time : 14/09/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 04:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on a network equipment

Start time : 15/09/2022 01:00 UTC End time : 15/09/2022 01:30 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be replacing a network equipment.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Dedicated Cloud] - End of Life Dedicated Cloud

incident_updates.body: End of Life Dedicated Cloud: 30 September 2022 We informed you in October 2021 that our Dedicad Cloud service will reach its end of life and will be discontinued the 30st September 2022. This step is important for your VMware platforms to improve the quality of service, performance, and security of your clusters. Indeed, "Dedicated Cloud" hardware used, pre-2016, does not allow us to provide the best level of service and integration with new modern architectures of VMware. Following our previous email, many customers started to plan and/or to migrate and we encourage you to do the same to avoid the September deadline. Guide to migrating to a new infrastructure: https://docs.ovh.com/gb/en/private-cloud/vdc-migration/
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 13/09/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 15/09/2922 16:00 UTC Service impact : No impact in production expected Service improvement : We need to remove OvhVeeamServers ressource pool so every OVH managed VM in the Hosted Private Cloud offer will be in OvhServers ressource pool
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Start time : 12/09/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 16/09/2022 19:00 UTC Service impact : Customers may lose access to their Vcenter management and hosts will be in maintenance mode during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling an update for VMware NSX related product.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Start time : 05/09/2022 06:00 UTC End time : 14/09/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : Backup and restore won't be available during the maintenance for the targets concerned. Service improvement : The Veeam Backup Managed solution will have a major upgrade.
